ns2:test-suite.name: Customer account has not been confirmed

test-case.name: should show message that the account has not been confirmed
test-case.title: should show message that the account has not been confirmed

failure.message:
Expect $(`div.message-error`) to have text
Expected: "Akun ini belum terkonfirmasi. Mohon cek email Anda untuk mengkonfirmasi." Received: "Password tidak cocok dengan akun ini. Verifikasi password dan coba lagi."
